verses.kjv: Therefore, thou son of man, prophesy against Gog, and say, Thus saith the Lord GOD; Behold, I am against thee, O Gog, the chief prince of Meshech and Tubal:
verses.web: “You, son of man, prophesy against Gog, and say, ‘The Lord LORD says: “Behold, I am against you, Gog, prince of Rosh, Meshech, and Tubal.
verses.ct: "Son of man, prophesy against Gog and tell him: This is what the Lord GOD says: I am against you, Gog, chief prince of Meshech and Tubal.

verses.kjv: And I will turn thee back, and leave but the sixth part of thee, and will cause thee to come up from the north parts, and will bring thee upon the mountains of Israel:
verses.web: I will turn you around, and will lead you on, and will cause you to come up from the uttermost parts of the north; and I will bring you onto the mountains of Israel.
verses.ct: I will turn you around and drag you forward, bringing you from the far north and leading you against the mountains of Israel.

verses.kjv: And I will smite thy bow out of thy left hand, and will cause thine arrows to fall out of thy right hand.
verses.web: I will strike your bow out of your left hand, and will cause your arrows to fall out of your right hand.
verses.ct: I will knock the bow from your left hand and send the arrows scattering from your right.

verses.kjv: Thou shalt fall upon the mountains of Israel, thou, and all thy bands, and the people that is with thee: I will give thee unto the ravenous birds of every sort, and to the beasts of the field to be devoured.
verses.web: You will fall on the mountains of Israel, you, and all your hordes, and the peoples who are with you. I will give you to the ravenous birds of every sort, and to the animals of the field to be devoured.
verses.ct: You will fall dead on the mountains of Israel — you, all your armies, and every ally who fights alongside you. I will hand your corpses over to every kind of scavenging bird and wild animal to devour.

verses.kjv: Thou shalt fall upon the open field: for I have spoken it, saith the Lord GOD.
verses.web: You will fall on the open field; for I have spoken it,” says the Lord LORD.
verses.ct: You will fall in the open field, because I have spoken it," declares the Lord GOD.

verses.kjv: And I will send a fire on Magog, and among them that dwell carelessly in the isles: and they shall know that I am the LORD.
verses.web: “I will send a fire on Magog, and on those who dwell securely in the islands. Then they will know that I am LORD.
verses.ct: "I will send fire on the land of Magog and on those who live comfortably in the coastlands. Then they will know that I am the LORD.

verses.kjv: So will I make my holy name known in the midst of my people Israel; and I will not let them pollute my holy name any more: and the heathen shall know that I am the LORD, the Holy One in Israel.
verses.web: “ ‘ “I will make my holy name known among my people Israel. I won’t allow my holy name to be profaned any more. Then the nations will know that I am LORD, the Holy One in Israel.
verses.ct: I will make my holy name known among my people Israel, and I will never again let my holy name be dishonored. Then the nations will know that I am the LORD, the Holy One in Israel.

verses.kjv: Behold, it is come, and it is done, saith the Lord GOD; this is the day whereof I have spoken.
verses.web: Behold, it comes, and it will be done,” says the Lord LORD. “This is the day about which I have spoken.
verses.ct: Pay attention — it is coming, and it will happen," declares the Lord GOD. "This is the day I have been talking about.

verses.kjv: And they that dwell in the cities of Israel shall go forth, and shall set on fire and burn the weapons, both the shields and the bucklers, the bows and the arrows, and the handstaves, and the spears, and they shall burn them with fire seven years:
verses.web: “ ‘ “Those who dwell in the cities of Israel will go out, and will make fires of the weapons and burn them, both the shields and the bucklers, the bows and the arrows, and the war clubs and the spears, and they will make fires with them for seven years;
verses.ct: "The people living in Israel's cities will go out and gather the weapons — shields, bucklers, bows, arrows, war clubs, and spears — and use them as fuel for fires. There will be enough to burn for 7 years.

verses.kjv: So that they shall take no wood out of the field, neither cut down any out of the forests; for they shall burn the weapons with fire: and they shall spoil those that spoiled them, and rob those that robbed them, saith the Lord GOD.
verses.web: so that they will take no wood out of the field, and not cut down any out of the forests; for they will make fires with the weapons. They will plunder those who plundered them, and rob those who robbed them,” says the Lord LORD.
verses.ct: They won't need to gather wood from the fields or chop trees from the forests, because the weapons alone will supply all the fuel they need. They will plunder those who plundered them and strip those who stripped them," declares the Lord GOD.

verses.kjv: And it shall come to pass in that day, that I will give unto Gog a place there of graves in Israel, the valley of the passengers on the east of the sea: and it shall stop the noses of the passengers: and there shall they bury Gog and all his multitude: and they shall call it The valley of Hamongog.
verses.web: “ ‘ “It will happen in that day, that I will give to Gog a place for burial in Israel, the valley of those who pass through on the east of the sea; and it will stop those who pass through. They will bury Gog and all his multitude there; and they will call it ‘The valley of Hamon Gog’.
verses.ct: "On that day, I will give Gog a burial ground in Israel — the Valley of the Travelers, east of the Dead Sea. The stench of the dead will be so overwhelming that it blocks the path of anyone passing through. Gog and his entire horde will be buried there, and the place will be called the Valley of Hamon-gog.

verses.kjv: And seven months shall the house of Israel be burying of them, that they may cleanse the land.
verses.web: “ ‘ “The house of Israel will be burying them for seven months, that they may cleanse the land.
verses.ct: It will take the people of Israel 7 months to bury all the dead and cleanse the land.

verses.kjv: Yea, all the people of the land shall bury them; and it shall be to them a renown the day that I shall be glorified, saith the Lord GOD.
verses.web: Yes, all the people of the land will bury them; and they will become famous in the day that I will be glorified,” says the Lord LORD.
verses.ct: Every person in the land will help with the burial, and it will bring them honor on the day I display my glory," declares the Lord GOD.

verses.kjv: And they shall sever out men of continual employment, passing through the land to bury with the passengers those that remain upon the face of the earth, to cleanse it: after the end of seven months shall they search.
verses.web: “ ‘ “They will set apart men of continual employment, who will pass through the land. Those who pass through will go with those who bury those who remain on the surface of the land, to cleanse it. After the end of seven months they will search.
verses.ct: "They will assign workers to a permanent task: traveling through the land to bury any remains still lying on the ground, in order to finish cleansing it. After the first 7 months, they will begin a thorough search.

verses.kjv: And the passengers that pass through the land, when any seeth a man’s bone, then shall he set up a sign by it, till the buriers have buried it in the valley of Hamongog.
verses.web: Those who pass through the land will pass through; and when anyone sees a man’s bone, then he will set up a sign by it, until the undertakers have buried it in the valley of Hamon Gog.
verses.ct: As these workers pass through the land, whenever someone spots a human bone, they will set up a marker beside it so the burial crews can come and take it to the Valley of Hamon-gog.

verses.kjv: And also the name of the city shall be Hamonah. Thus shall they cleanse the land.
verses.web: Hamonah will also be the name of a city. Thus they will cleanse the land.” ’
verses.ct: A city nearby will even be named Hamonah. In this way, they will cleanse the land."

verses.kjv: And, thou son of man, thus saith the Lord GOD; Speak unto every feathered fowl, and to every beast of the field, Assemble yourselves, and come; gather yourselves on every side to my sacrifice that I do sacrifice for you, even a great sacrifice upon the mountains of Israel, that ye may eat flesh, and drink blood.
verses.web: “You, son of man, the Lord LORD says: ‘Speak to the birds of every sort, and to every animal of the field, “Assemble yourselves, and come; gather yourselves on every side to my sacrifice that I sacrifice for you, even a great sacrifice on the mountains of Israel, that you may eat meat and drink blood.
verses.ct: "Son of man, this is what the Lord GOD says: Call out to every kind of bird and every wild animal — 'Come together! Gather from every direction to the great sacrifice I am preparing for you on the mountains of Israel. You will feast on flesh and drink blood.

verses.kjv: Ye shall eat the flesh of the mighty, and drink the blood of the princes of the earth, of rams, of lambs, and of goats, of bullocks, all of them fatlings of Bashan.
verses.web: You shall eat the flesh of the mighty, and drink the blood of the princes of the earth, of rams, of lambs, and of goats, of bulls, all of them fatlings of Bashan.
verses.ct: You will eat the flesh of warriors and drink the blood of the earth's princes — as though they were rams, lambs, goats, and bulls, all fattened in the rich pastures of Bashan.

verses.kjv: And ye shall eat fat till ye be full, and drink blood till ye be drunken, of my sacrifice which I have sacrificed for you.
verses.web: You shall eat fat until you are full, and drink blood until you are drunk, of my sacrifice which I have sacrificed for you.
verses.ct: You will gorge yourselves on fat until you're stuffed and drink blood until you're drunk — all from this sacrifice I have prepared for you.

verses.kjv: Thus ye shall be filled at my table with horses and chariots, with mighty men, and with all men of war, saith the Lord GOD.
verses.web: You shall be filled at my table with horses and chariots, with mighty men, and with all men of war,” says the Lord LORD.’
verses.ct: At my table you will be filled with horses and riders, mighty warriors and soldiers of every kind,'" declares the Lord GOD.

verses.kjv: And I will set my glory among the heathen, and all the heathen shall see my judgment that I have executed, and my hand that I have laid upon them.
verses.web: “I will set my glory among the nations. Then all the nations will see my judgment that I have executed, and my hand that I have laid on them.
verses.ct: "I will display my glory among the nations. Every nation will witness the judgment I have carried out and the power of my hand against them.

verses.kjv: So the house of Israel shall know that I am the LORD their God from that day and forward.
verses.web: So the house of Israel will know that I am LORD their God, from that day and forward.
verses.ct: From that day forward, the people of Israel will know that I am the LORD their God.

verses.kjv: And the heathen shall know that the house of Israel went into captivity for their iniquity: because they trespassed against me, therefore hid I my face from them, and gave them into the hand of their enemies: so fell they all by the sword.
verses.web: The nations will know that the house of Israel went into captivity for their iniquity; because they trespassed against me, and I hid my face from them; so I gave them into the hand of their adversaries, and they all fell by the sword.
verses.ct: The nations will understand that Israel went into captivity because of their sin. They betrayed me, so I turned my face away from them and handed them over to their enemies. They fell by the sword, every one of them.

verses.kjv: According to their uncleanness and according to their transgressions have I done unto them, and hid my face from them.
verses.web: I did to them according to their uncleanness and according to their transgressions. I hid my face from them.
verses.ct: I dealt with them according to their corruption and their rebellion, and I hid my face from them.

verses.kjv: Therefore thus saith the Lord GOD; Now will I bring again the captivity of Jacob, and have mercy upon the whole house of Israel, and will be jealous for my holy name;
verses.web: “Therefore the Lord LORD says: ‘Now I will reverse the captivity of Jacob, and have mercy on the whole house of Israel. I will be jealous for my holy name.
verses.ct: "So this is what the Lord GOD says: Now I will restore the fortunes of Jacob and have mercy on the entire house of Israel. I will be fiercely protective of my holy name.

verses.kjv: After that they have borne their shame, and all their trespasses whereby they have trespassed against me, when they dwelt safely in their land, and none made them afraid.
verses.web: They will bear their shame, and all their trespasses by which they have trespassed against me, when they dwell securely in their land, and no one will make them afraid,
verses.ct: They will carry the weight of their shame and all the ways they betrayed me — but they will live safely in their own land, with no one to terrorize them.

verses.kjv: When I have brought them again from the people, and gathered them out of their enemies’ lands, and am sanctified in them in the sight of many nations;
verses.web: when I have brought them back from the peoples, and gathered them out of their enemies’ lands, and am sanctified in them in the sight of many nations.
verses.ct: When I bring them back from foreign peoples and gather them out of their enemies' lands, I will demonstrate my holiness through them for many nations to see.

verses.kjv: Then shall they know that I am the LORD their God, which caused them to be led into captivity among the heathen: but I have gathered them unto their own land, and have left none of them any more there.
verses.web: They will know that I am LORD their God, in that I caused them to go into captivity among the nations, and have gathered them to their own land. Then I will leave none of them captive any more.
verses.ct: Then they will know that I am the LORD their God. I was the one who sent them into exile among the nations, and I am the one who gathered them back to their own land, leaving not a single one behind.

verses.kjv: Neither will I hide my face any more from them: for I have poured out my spirit upon the house of Israel, saith the Lord GOD.
verses.web: I won’t hide my face from them any more; for I have poured out my Spirit on the house of Israel,’ says the Lord LORD.”
verses.ct: I will never again hide my face from them, because I will pour out my spirit on the house of Israel," declares the Lord GOD.
